string.value: Todd's Hunting Method
There's a fellow named #bTodd#k who can teach you how to hunt in Maple World.

Todd says the #bCtrl#k key lets you perform basic attacks on monsters and wants you to hunt the Jr. Sentinel nearby. Hunt the #rJr. Sentinel#k, obtain 1 #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k, and bring it to #bPeter#k. 

Jr. Sentinel #r#a1##k 

#i4031802# #t4031802# #b#c4031802##k/1

You learned that skills can be accessed by pressing #bK#k to open the Skill Inventory. Unlike regular attacks, you need to raise a skill's level by assigning Skill Points. Peter also said that it's much more convenient to assign skills to the Quick Slot bars.
이야~ 새로운 여행자인가? 내 이름은 토드야. 이곳에서 새로운 여행자들에게 몬스터 사냥법에 대해 알려주고 있지. 버섯마을 안에는 몬스터가 없지만 마을에서 조금만 벗어나도 몬스터들이 우글대고 있어서, 처음 여행하는 사람들은 위험하거든.
우선 기본 공격은 Crtl 키로 할 수 있어. 닿지 않도록 조심하면서 몬스터에게 다가가서 공격하면 돼. 별로 어렵지 않지? 그럼 어디 한 번 직접 몬스터 사냥을 해볼래?
그럼 저 옆에 있는 주니어 스톤볼을 사냥해봐. 원래는 강한 몬스터이지만 초보 모험가를 위해 대마법사 하인즈님이 봉인 마법을 걸어 놓은 녀석이니 너도 안심하고 사냥할 수 있을 거야.
주니어 스톤볼을 사냥하면 주니어 스톤볼의 돌조각을 전리품으로 얻을 수 있어. 아이템은 Z키로 주울 수 있으니, 사냥 후 주니어 스톤볼의 돌조각을 주워서 피터에게 가봐. 피터라면 너에게 스킬로 공격하는 법을 알려줄 거야.
흐음. 아직 겁이 나는 모양이지? 걱정할 것 없어. 차분히 연습하다 보면 금방 강해질 수 있을 거야.

Oh, hello! My name is Todd, and I teach new travelers like you #bhow to hunt monsters#k. You won't find any real monsters around here, but if you venture out into the world, you'll find a ton. It can be quite dangerous if you're not prepared...
Let's discuss #bbasic attacks#k. You can perform them by pressing the #bCtrl key#k. Approach a monster, but not so close that you touch it, then attack with confidence! Got it?
You see the #rJr. Sentinel#k there? Attack it! Normally, they're very powerful, but Grendel the Really Old, the head of all magicians, put a seal on it so beginners like you can practice.

Once you successfully hunt a Jr. Sentinel, you can pick up the item it drops! In this case, that's a Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece. To pick it up, press #bZ#k while standing on top of it. Try picking up a #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k and giving it to #bPeter#k.
Are you afraid of fighting? Don't worry. Practice makes perfect, and you'll be good at this in no time.
Ah, you have a Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece. I see that Todd has taught you the basics of hunting. Now, I shall teach you how to #buse skills#k.

Press #bK#k to open the Skill Inventory and see your skills. Unlike regular attacks, skills can only be used after you raise a skill's level using Skill Points. You earn Skill Points by leveling up, but be careful when assigning those points to different skills.
The level of a skill affects how well it works. You have to calculate which skills will maximize your hunting abilities and invest in them first.

Assign skills to the #bQuick Slot#k at the bottom right of the screen. Just drag icons from the Skill Inventory to the Quick Slots and you're set! Right now, regular attacks might be the most effective, but later on, skills become devastatingly powerful.

Thats about it for skills. As a gift, I just gave you an item you can wear on your head. Go to the Equip tab in your Item Inventory and #bdouble-click on the item#k to equip it. To #bcheck that you've equipped it,#k press #bE#k. Happy traveling!
Eh? You haven't gone to see #bPeter#k yet? Just hunt a #rJr. Sentinel#k, pick up a #bJr. Sentinel's Shellpiece#k, and give it to him.

Todd taught you how to hunt, but you haven't really put that into practice. Either that, or you forgot to pick up the dropped item. Press #bCtrl#k to attack a #rJr. Sentinel#k, then pick up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k by pressing Z.
